戦えるのは
お前だけなんじゃよ。

関係あるかも
しれんしな。

と思って行ってくれ。齔
［おお、そうじゃ。
フィリップス王子
への手紙］と、少ないが
これで旅の準備を
整えてくれ。

開けておこう。
装備を整えてから
行くようにな。
Nassel? Welcome back! I'm sure everyone:
Nassel, you came at
a good time.
The fact is, I need
a favor from you.
And the favor I'm
talking about
concerns Gilys. As
you've also heard,
he's been trapped
inside that cave.\
It's unfair to you,
so soon after your
return, but you are
the only one in this
town who can fight
the monsters.\
It's possible that
they relate to the
corruption of the
water. Think of it
as saving the town!\
Oh, of course. Take
this [letter to
Prince Phi]lips, and
provision yourself
for the journey with
this small sum.
I'll have the cave
opened. Gather some
equipment before you
leave!
